## IslandSvc type

Island Svc type - the service type available to island components Use this with createIsland<IslandSvc>() for typed islands

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type IslandSvc = SignalsSvc & ViewSvc;
```
**References:** [SignalsSvc](../../signals/signalssvc/)<!-- -->, [ViewSvc](../viewsvc/)
